<nlog xmlns="http://www.nlog-project.org/schemas/NLog.xsd"
      xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

	<targets async="true">
		<target name="logfile" xsi:type="File" fileName="${basedir}/logs/${shortdate}.log" layout="${longdate}|${level:uppercase=true}|${logger}|${threadid}|${message}|${exception:format=tostring}" />
	</targets>

	<rules>
		<logger name="*" minlevel="Info" writeTo="logfile" />
	</rules>
</nlog>
